alert.note: Alert for Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 8:07PM EDT until July 12 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN PISCATAQUIS...SOUTHERN AROOSTOOK AND CENTRAL PENOBSCOT COUNTIES... At 807 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Sherman to near Lake View Plantation, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Millinocket, Dover-Foxcroft, Howland, Brownville Junction, Milo, East Millinocket, Medway, Sherman, Ebeemee, Lake View Plantation, Licoln Township, southeastern Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument, Enfield, Brownville, Lagrange, Sebec, Chester, Stacyville, Medford and Woodville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
